devnet_scope.highlight: bal-devnet-2 scope delayed; EIP-7843 (slot opcode) CL changes causing debate
bal-devnet-2 scope moved to Monday ACDT; launch end of January

eip_clarifications.highlight: EIP-7778: cumulative gas should reflect block accounting, not user costs
EIP-8024 SWAPN/DUPN: bitpacking vs postfix PUSH encoding decision Monday
EIP-7708 ETH transfer logs: PR pending for log address/topic decisions

state_growth_pricing.highlight: EIP-8037: separate state gas budget tied to block gas limit
Vitalik alternative: static repricing (contracts 300K, storage 80K, accounts 100K)
State growth decision deferred to Monday ACDT

glamsterdam_pfi_decisions.highlight: DFI: EIP-7793 (Conditional Txs) - insufficient client support
DFI: EIP-5920 (PAY opcode) - no client ranked above B
DFI: EIP-8051 (ML-DSA) - PQ standards still evolving
DFI: EIP-7971 (T-Store limits) - AA concerns unresolved

contract_size_limits.highlight: Code reads scale sublinearly: 128x size = 8.5x read time
CFI: EIP-7954 bumps contract limit 24KB→32KB, initcode→64KB
DFI: EIP-7907 (metered size) and EIP-7903 (remove initcode limit)

action_items.action: Review EIP-7778 PR on cumulative gas / EIP-7623 interaction
Feedback on EIP-8024 encoding options before Monday
Evaluate EIP-8037 state growth options for ACDT

targets.target: Monday ACDT - bal-devnet-2 scope, EIP-8037, EIP-8024 decisions
